wxColour GetColour ()
 Returns the new selected colour.

Detailed Description

wxColourPickerEvent class.

This event is fired each time the user changes the selected colour in the control. If the user chooses the same colour, then no event is sent. In order to catch the event, you can use the EVT_COLOUR_CHANGED(id, func) macro. This event is also fired when you programatically change the selected colour.

Member Function Documentation
